```{r}

marmots
```

```{r}

```

```{r}

pika
```

```{r}
class(pika)
```

```{r}
bear <- c(20L, 3L, 5L, 18L, 23L)

bear
```

```{r}
class(bear)
```

```{r}
ringtail <- c(4.3, 8.9, 2.6, 7.1)
fox <- c(9.0, 12.5, 5.4, 10.9)

ringtail + fox
```
```{r}
fox - ringtail

```

```{r}
100 * ringtail
```

```{r}
ringtail %*% fox
```
